title: Smokin' Blind!
itunes:title: Smokin' Blind!
description: Today on The Cigar Authority we're smoking three premium cigars blind to guess which is the Honduran, Dominican, and Nicaraguan. We talk about the industry's latest news and insights, and everything cigar. It's time for the finer things in life... It's time for The Cigar Authority!
